errors_core_access_denied: Access to the restricted function has been denied by the system.
errors_core_database_error: The application encountered an database communication error and is unable complete the current task.
errors_core_required_object_not_found: The application was unable to load a required component.
errors_core_tid_invalid: The specified task ID is invalid.
errors_core_unknown_error: The application encountered an unknown error and is unable complete the current task.
errors_core_unsupported_command: The application has been accessed using an unknown command.
